content: उदच्, उदंच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}|उदङ्|{%<ab>n.</ab>%}|उदक्|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}|उदीची) {@--1@} Turned or going upwards. {@--2@} Upper, higher; °कूलः, °तीरः &c. {@--3@} Northern, turned towards the north. {@--4@} Subsequent. --क {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Above. {@--2@} Northward, to the north of (with <ab>abl.</ab>); <ls>Ms. 3. 217.</ls> {@--3@} Subsequently.
